title: Duet Stainless Steel Skimmer and Rice Spoon (Set of 2)
description: This stylish, mirror-finish skimmer/rice spoon set is a striking, handy addition to any kitchen. A sturdy, stainless steel design ensures durability, reliability, and ease of cleaning, and a convenient handle loop means storage is a cinch. Use the skimmer for soups, sauces, or creams, and the wide-bowl rice spoon makes serving rice easy and mess-free. An excellent set for any aspiring chef, this Duet 2-piece set will prove easy to clean and long lasting.Stainless steel body ensures utensils are reliable and remain cool to the touchElegant mirror finish to match a modern kitchen styleEasily cleaned and storedLong-lasting, durable construction
